name: Box of Dynamite
desc: Gain Lt. Droneboy . While in combat, your drones drop sticks of dynamite that detonate for 240% damage (+85% per stack) , stunning enemies. Recharges after 10 seconds.
notes:
The Box of Dynamite is an item in Risk of Rain 2, added in the Alloyed Collective expansion.
The holder gains   Lt. Droneboy as an ally. Every 10 seconds while in combat, your Drones will drop sticks of dynamite that explode, stunning enemies and dealing 240% damage (+85% per stack).


== Drone Skills ==
Like   Col. Droneman, Lt. Droneboy has no innate skills, essentially being just a filler drone to make the item better if the owner has few or no drones.
Lt. Droneboy has a unique activation for   Operator.


== Notes ==
This item empowers all owned minions tagged as Mechanical, not just Drones.
Not all minions have item displays for the Dynamite, so may not be clear which ones get it.
Note only Drones get the buff icon in the ally card.
This item is meant to work on Devoted Lemurians but does not due to a bug.
Instead it works on wild Lemurians, which can be recruited by Happiest Mask.
